name: Strength Conditioning
description: When you tackle a smorbot it’s pushed back twice as far as it normally would be.

name: Breakfast Club
description: Correctly typing phrases longer than 7 characters makes the Melonballers stronger – they'll scrap smorbots with fewer tackles.

name: Night Classes
description: Halves the time it takes for you to get a new phrase after you've made a typo.

name: Speed Drills
description: Doubles the Melonballers' running speeds so that they can more easily keep opponents from reaching your endzone.

name: Bawling™ Sponsorship
description: More helmets will appear on the field during each level.

name: Spare Cleats
description: Start each level with 1 set of cleats.

name: Snike™ Sponsorship
description: More cleats will appear on the field during each level.

name: Loudmouth™ Sponsorship
description: More bullhorns will appear on the field during each level.
